item.title: Setting up a GCE Instance as an Inlets Exit Node
item.description: The prolific Alex Ellis has a new project, Inlets. Here's a quick tutorial using Google Compute Platform's (GCP) Compute Engine (GCE). NB I'm using one of Google's “Always free” f1-micro instances but you may still pay for network *gress and storage Assumptions I'm assuming you've a Google account, have used GCP and have a billing account established, i.e. the following returns at least one billing account: gcloud beta billing accounts list If you've only one billing account and it's the one you wish to use, then you can:
